Introduction

Melody Day was a 4-member girl group under Cre.ker Entertainment. The group consisted of Yeoeun, Yoomin, Yein, and Chahee. Melody Day debuted on February 25, 2014. After almost four years of promoting, Melody Day officially disbanded on December 25, 2018.

Current state:
